name: SwingMusic
short_description: Modern self-hosted music player with clean interface and audio visualization.
description: SwingMusic is a beautiful, modern music player for your self-hosted music library. It features a clean minimalist interface, gapless playback, queue management, playlists, search, albums/artists views, and audio visualization. Simply point it to your music folder and enjoy. Supports common audio formats and organizes your music automatically using metadata.
usecases: Stream your local music collection from any browser.
Create playlists and manage your music library.
Enjoy gapless playback with modern UI.
